snippet.title: Escape Simulator: Portal Escape Chamber DLC - September 7th
snippet.description:
Portal Escape Chamber is a free DLC for Escape Simulator, made by Pine Studio and based on the fictitious “Aperture Science” from Valve’s beloved Portal games. Get it here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2000170/Escape_Simulator_Portal_Escape_Chamber/

© 2023 Valve Corporation, all rights reserved. Valve, the Valve logo, Portal, the Portal logo, Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation.

#escapesimulator #portal #valve #dlc #steam #gaming
